Description: (v1.0) AWS CFT to deploy a VPC with 2 subnets (Public, Private) across 2x Availability Zones.

VPCCIDR.Description: Provide a network CIDR for the VPC

AZForSubnet1.Description: Select an Availability Zone for the first set of subnets

AZForSubnet2.Description: Select an Availability Zone for the second set of subnets

PublicSubnet1.Description: Provide a network CIDR for PublicSubnet1

PrivateSubnet1.Description: Provide a network CIDR for PrivateSubnet1

PublicSubnet2.Description: Provide a network CIDR for PublicSubnet2

PrivateSubnet2.Description: Provide a network CIDR for PrivateSubnet2

FortiGateInstanceType.Description: Select the instance type for the FortiGate

CIDRForInstanceAccess.Description: Provide a network CIDR from which the FortiGate instances will be accessed

KeyPair.Description: Select a keypair to associate with the FortiGate

EncryptVolumes.Description: Select 'true' to encrypt the FortiGate (FortiADC, K8s & Jenkins as well) instance OS and Log volumes with your account's KMS default master key for EBS.  Otherwise select false to leave unencrypted

InitS3Bucket.Description: Provide the Init S3 Bucket name, where your config files will be created  *** the bucket should exist in the same region as this deployment for successful bootstrapping ***

FortiGateLicenseType.Description: Select the license type for the FortiGate

FortiGateLicenseFile.Description: [BYOL Only, leave blank for PAYG] Provide the name of the BYOL license file in the Init S3 Bucket for the FortiGate (ie Fgt.lic or prefix/Fgt.lic)

FortiADCInstanceType.Description: Select the instance type for the FortiADC

FortiADCLicenseType.Description: Select the license type for the FortiADC

K8sInstanceType.Description: Select the instance type for the Kubernetes nodes

Properties.Description: Allow instances to access each other
